q_ch: Elite Sewers 在2024年6月30日前分配的缝纫任务有哪些？
q_en: What sewing tasks will Elite Sewers be assigned before June 30, 2024?
gt:
Hey there! 😄 Let's take a look at the sewing tasks assigned to the "Elite Sewers" before June 30, 2024. Here's what I found:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Order Product ID | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status |
|---------|------------------|------------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|--------|
| 31      | May 26, 2024     | June 4, 2024     | 31               | 260            | 260              | 1      |

Looks like the "Elite Sewers" have a task lined up from May 26 to June 4, 2024, and they've already completed it! 🎉 If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! 😊

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Elite Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for "Elite Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.start_time, st.end_time, op.product_id, op.number FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id WHERE st.working_group_id = '10' AND st.start_time < '2024-06-30';
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks assigned to "Elite Sewers" before June 30, 2024

response:
Hey there! 😄 Let's take a look at the sewing tasks assigned to the "Elite Sewers" before June 30, 2024. Here's what I found:

| Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Product ID | Number of Items |
|---------|---------------------|---------------------|------------|-----------------|
| 31      | May 26, 2024        | June 4, 2024        | 15         | 260             |

It looks like the "Elite Sewers" will be working on a task starting on May 26, 2024, and wrapping up by June 4, 2024. They'll be sewing 260 items of product ID 15. Keep up the great work, Elite Sewers! 🧵✨
